title: Exquisite Diamond and Emerald Flower Haaram - A Modern Masterpiece
features: A delicate floral motif necklace featuring meticulously set brilliant-cut diamonds. The central pendant showcases a vibrant green emerald flower surrounded by diamonds, adding a pop of color and elegance. The necklace features flower and leaf motif links with a graduating design, culminating in three diamond-studded pendants.
occasions: or any special occasion where you want to radiate timeless elegance. Can also be styled for upscale modern gatherings.
description: This Haaram combines classic South Indian design principles with modern aesthetics. The Hyderabadi polish ensures a lasting luster, while the high-quality diamonds provide exceptional brilliance. The emerald accent adds a touch of regality and symbolizes prosperity. A versatile piece that can be cherished for generations.
